meanings.definition: A garment worn by Jewish priests in ancient times.
meanings.sent1: The ephods were colorful robes worn by the priests.
meanings.sent2: The ephods were an important part of the priest's attire.
meanings.sent3: The ephods made the priests look very special during ceremonies.
meanings.sent4: The ephods were like a symbol of the priest's authority.
meanings.sent5: The ephods shimmered in the sunlight, catching everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: A sacred object used in religious ceremonies.
meanings.sent1: During the ritual, the priest held the ephods with reverence.
meanings.sent2: The ephods were carefully placed on the altar before the ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The ephods were believed to bring blessings to the worshippers.
meanings.sent4: The ephods were passed down through generations, carrying the prayers of many.
meanings.sent5: The ephods gleamed in the candlelight, adding a mystical aura to the ceremony.
